name: Cajun Corn Nuggets
author: DiAnna P
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups yellow cornmeal, or more as needed
1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
directions: Combine cornmeal, flour, baking powder, Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Combine whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, onion, and egg in a medium bowl
Add to the dry mixture and mix well
It should be stiff; if not, add a little more cornmeal
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Drop batter by spoonfuls into the hot oil and fry in batches until golden on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes
Transfer nuggets to a plate lined with paper towels to drain excess oil
